item.title: Building my own guitar, part 3
item.description: TL;DR: Received the new neck and... it fits perfectly ! The neck # UPS just delivered the new neck, which is a 24 frets PRS clone:

item.title: Building my own guitar, part 2
item.description: TL;DR: Received the neck... too bad it's not exactly the one I ordered :-) The neck # For the neck, I wanted a 24 frets neck and found one that I liked online.

item.title: Building my own guitar, part 1
item.description: TL;DR: I'm building a guitar from scratch, picking up every component but skipping the tricky cut and glue bits :-) About this project # The primary goal of this project is to build a custom guitar, picking each and every component one by one, so that it’s 100% what I want it to be.
